freenet.pluginmanager
Interface FredPluginBaseL10n

public interface FredPluginBaseL10n

Interface that has to be implemented for plugins that wants to use the node's localization system (recommended). Those methods are called by the node when plugin l10n data are needed, ex. to automate things in the translation page.

Author:
Artefact2
